companies.description: Contains static information about each publicly traded company in the dataset

columns.ticker: Stock ticker symbol for the company.
columns.sector: Primary industry sector of the company.
columns.name: Name of the company

financials.description: Stores quarterly financial performance metrics for each company

columns.id: Unique identifier for each financial record
columns.ticker: Stock ticker symbol of the company.
columns.fiscal_year: The fiscal year for the reported period
columns.fiscal_quarter: The fiscal quarter for the reported period (e.g. Q1, Q2)
columns.period_end: The end date of the reporting period
columns.revenue_m: Reported revenue in millions of USD
columns.net_income_m: Reported net income in millions of USD
columns.eps: Earnings per share for the period in USD
columns.shares_out_m: Number of shares outstanding in millions

daily_prices.description: Holds daily stock price and trading volume data for each company. Always use the difference between the close and open prices to get the percentage change.

columns.id: Unique identifier for each price record
columns.ticker: Stock ticker symbol of the company.
columns.date: Trading date for the price data
columns.open: Stock opening price on the given date in USD
columns.high: Highest price reached during the trading day in USD
columns.low: Lowest price reached during the trading day in USD
columns.close: Closing price on the given date in USD
columns.volume: Number of shares traded on the given date
